item.description:
This is the start of a new 3rd edition D&D campaign in a custom build world. Beginners are welcome to participate! This first gathering will be to create characters and to go over the game world. Questions will be answered, food eaten, beverages consumed, etc...

Location is in North Smithfield, RI right off of Route 146. Directions will be provided. All campaign info will be provided to anyone who expresses interest.

Please be aware I have 2 cats and 2 dogs so those with allergies are warned. They are all very friendly!
item.name: Storm Haven Campaign
